Class m_Matrix3

  • java.lang.Object
    • reuze.m_Matrix3
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class m_Matrix3
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A 3x3 column major matrix for 2D transforms.
    Author:
    mzechner
    See Also:
